channel.title: Resources on Ruoran
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Ruoran

item.title: What is this site about?
item.description: Goal of this site: to save and share resources in an easy-to-find format. To-do list for this site: Turn research/teaching in to a list of projects/courses. (Have one specific page for each project/course, with links to resources.) Add a gallary page to show pictures and drawings. Write often.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: First post! I’ll use this space for sharing reading and research notes. This site was created following the Blogdown book, using the hugo sam theme.
